project.name: lib-linux-executable
project.description:
Linux Executables
A collection of Java process wrappers around native Linux common commands; such as WGET, ZIP, MySQL, MySQLImport, etc.
v1.1.0 - first release v1.2.0 - use temporary files, then pivot when done v1.3.0 - update mysqlImport and mysql executables, use properties, improve stability v1.3.1 - return properties result from WGET and MySQL execution v1.3.2 - return properties result from ZIP unarchive method v1.3.3 - rename from lib-linux-utility t0 lib-linux-executable v1.4.0 - refactor containing package, rename some classes v1.4.1 - change status keys to lower case v1.4.2 - fix wget, do not download into the destination directory
